competency.info.ability_search: Enter the description of the ability here.
competency.info.add_competency_association: Click the button below to select a competency.
competency.info.create_learning_objective: Click the button below to create a new objective.
competency.info.no_ability_activities: No activity is associated with this ability.
competency.info.no_learning_objectives: There are no learning objectives yet.
competency.info.no_competency_activities: No activity is associated with this competency.
competency.info.no_competency_association: There are no associatied competencies yet.
competency.info.no_frame: There are no frameworks yet. You can create a new framework or manage the scales of difficulty using the buttons below.
competency.info.no_frame_no_scale: There are no frameworks and no scales yet. If you choose to create a framework now, it will be assigned a default scale of one level. Alternatively, you can create a scale and then directly associate it with your framework.
competency.info.no_frame_to_select: No competency framework has been defined yet.
competency.info.no_group_objectives: No objective has been assigned to a group yet. You can assign objectives to groups in the "Objectives" tab.
competency.info.no_my_objectives: No learning objective is currently assigned to you.
competency.info.no_scale: There are no scales yet. You can create a new scale using the button below.
competency.info.no_objective_group_users: This group has currently no members.
competency.info.no_objective_groups: This objective has not yet been assigned to a group. You can assign objectives to groups in the "Objectives" tab.
competency.info.no_objective_users: This objective has not been assigned to a user yet. You can assign objectives to users in the "Objectives" tab.
competency.info.no_user_competency_history: No activity associated with this competency has been made yet.
competency.info.no_user_objectives: No objective has been assigned to a user yet. You can assign objectives to users in the "Objectives" tab.
competency.info.scale_levels:
The levels must be separated by line breaks. Example:

Easy
Medium
Hard.
competency.message.ability_association_deletion_con: Are you sure you want to delete the association with this ability ?
competency.message.ability_deletion_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this ability ?
competency.message.competency_already_associated: This competency is already associated with the activity.
competency.message.competency_association_deletion_: Are you sure you want to delete the association with this competency ?
competency.message.competency_deletion_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this competency ? This action is irreversible.
competency.message.framework_deletion_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this framework ? This action is irreversible.
competency.message.objective_already_assigned_to_gr: This objective has already been assigned to this group.
competency.message.objective_already_assigned_to_us: This objective has already been assigned to this user.
competency.message.objective_association_deletion_c: Are you sure you want to remove this competency from the objective ?
competency.message.objective_competency_already_ass: This competency is already associated with the objective.
competency.message.objective_deletion_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this objective ? This action is irreversible.
competency.message.objective_from_group_not_unassig: This objective cannot be removed directly because it has been assigned to one of the user groups.
competency.message.objective_unassign_group_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this objective from this group ?
competency.message.objective_unassign_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this objective from this user ?
competency.message.scale_deletion_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this scale ?
competency.objective.pick_level: Select the competency level to achieve
competency.objective.unassign_group: Take away an objective from a group
competency.objective.unassign_user: Take away an objective from a user
competency.tooltip.undeletable_scale: This scale cannot be deleted because it is associated with a framework.
competency.tooltip.undeletable_scale_plural: This scale cannot be deleted because it is associated with %count% frameworks.
competency.tooltip.uneditable_scale: This scale cannot be edited because it is associated with an ability.
competency.tooltip.uneditable_scale_plural: This scale cannot be edited because it is associated with %count% abilities.
competency.user_picker.enter_user_search: Enter a first name, last name or username and select a suggestion in the list.
competency.user_picker.enter_group_search: Enter a group name and select a suggestion in the list.
